name: Yatopia
author: unknown@unknown.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Yatopia installation script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl jq wget
echo -e "Downloading Yatopia"
cd /mnt/server
wget https://api.yatopiamc.org/v2/latestBuild/download?branch=ver/1.16.5 -O server.jar
if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
echo -e "Downloading MC server.properties"
curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/minecraft/java/server.properties
fi
